Articles.Content:
I know it's a weird name for it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

This jet allows you to change the AoA of the wings between +6 and -6. Of course, this jet uses [Infernal Robotics](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116064-1-0-2-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-21-2).

Pictures!

[http://imgur.com/a/KLxzK](http://imgur.com/a/KLxzK)

Hotkeys!

- I - Raises AoA to +6
- 2 - Resets AoA to 0
- K - Lowers AoA to -6

[Download the craft!](https://www.dropbox.com/s/man7t8545njbfaz/Variable%20Wing%20Delta%20Jet.craft?dl=1)
